root.description: Band letter (Z = lowest, A = highest) followed by five‑digit centre‑frequency in Hz (00020‑20000). Example: Z18750.

micro.description: Micro‑tuning ± 0–50 cents. Format: sign (P=up, N=down) + three‑digit value (e.g. P025, N050).

fm.description: FM block: 4‑digit depth (0000‑1000), rate letter (Z = slowest, A = fastest), 4‑digit links (0000‑1000). Example: 0120Z0045.

description: Prefix (FRE) + root (band + Hz) + micro (sign + 3) + FM (depth 4 + rate letter + links 4); all concatenated, zero‑padded, no subvar prefixes.
